Pyromania.name: Pyromania
Pyromania.blurb: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.
Pyromania.description: Innate - Pyromania: Annie gains a stack of Pyromania when she casts a spell, up to a maximum of 4. At 4 stacks, she gains Energized.
Pyromania.description2: Energized: When Annie succeeds in her next cast damaging ability, she consumes all Pyromania stacks and  stuns enemies hit for 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 (based on level) seconds.
Pyromania.description3: Annie loses Energized and all Pyromania stacks upon death.
Pyromania.notes:
* If  resurrecting, Annie will not lose Pyromania stacks but will lose Energized.
 The stun applies to the first ability that lands when the stun is available. If you cast  Disintegrate followed by  Incinerate while the stun is available and Incinerate lands first, the stun will be applied through Incinerate.

Disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate.blurb: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
Disintegrate.description: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy, dealing  magic damage.
Disintegrate.description2: If Disintegrate kills its target, it refunds its  mana cost and half of its  cooldown is immediately refreshed.

Incinerate.name: Incinerate
Incinerate.blurb: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
Incinerate.description: Active: Annie releases a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area.

Molten Shield.name: Molten Shield
Molten Shield.blurb: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
Molten Shield.description: Active: Annie wraps herself and  Tibbers in a fiery aura, gaining  30% − 60% (based on level) bonus movement speed decaying over 1.5 seconds, and reducing damage taken for 3 seconds.
Molten Shield.description2: Enemies who deal basic attack Annie or  Tibbers during this time are dealt back magic damage.
Molten Shield.notes:
* Molten Shield does not deal damage against towers and their attacks.
 Attacks that  miss against Annie or  Tibbers will not cause the shield to deal damage.

Summon Tibbers.name: Summon: Tibbers
Summon Tibbers.blurb: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
Summon Tibbers.description: First Cast: Annie summons  Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies.
Summon Tibbers.description2: He then remains on the field as a controllable pet for up to 45 seconds.
Summon Tibbers.description3: Tibbers Active: Annie directs Tibbers to the target location.
